price: 20. Nabiyow korosuk:cagalah anu inni Rabbi aqbudeeh agleh inkittu kaat mahaa qibaadál keenik ixxic.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
